comment: If you're thinking about taking another professor, I strongly advise against it. Dr. Warner is the best professor you'll ever have at KSU. The assignments are a breeze, and you'll get super helpful feedback. It's hands down the easiest class I've ever taken here. Trust me, you won't regret it!
Dr. Warner is amazing! He genuinely cares for you and your grades.  Literally just get the work done and you will get a 100 on every assignment. He also doesn't penalize for late work. TAKE HIM!

Dr. Warner is a great professor. I had him for my research course as a graduate student and found his rubrics and samples extremely helpful. He guides you through everything and makes it simple to understand.

I recommend taking Dr. Warner's class he is super organized and has the due dates at the beginning of the semester. There are a lot of discussion boards but they're pretty easy if you do the reading and watch the video he has assigned.  Assignments due every 1-2 weeks depending on the unit but he is GREAT at grading work & feedback.10/10 professor!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: easiest class ive ever taken, thought i was never doing enough. 1 discussion post a week and maybe like 6 bigger assignments the entire semester. his feedback is so thoughtful and inspiring to a future educator. please please please take dr. warner! i loved his class so incredibly much. responds to emails super fast and is a very fast grader.

Ok im still in the process of taking 2130 with Dr. Warner but I can wholeheartedly say he is the best professor I've ever had. His responses are so kind and thoughtful, he grades very graciously, and besides a few projects here and there, this class is mostly composed of discussion posts. He is so sweet and the syllabus is so clear. 10000/10
Dr. Warner was great with giving such kind feedback. He is truly inspirational and makes me feel prepared to become a teacher. I would highly suggest taking his class.
awesome professor! i took his online 2130 class and he always left encouraging, nice feedback :) the workload is not bad at all and i got 100s on everything, easy A as long as you do the weekly work!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I would take this man for every class if I could. He is so understanding, he gives wonderful feedback, he grades everything the day you turn it in. He is the definition of the perfect professor. 10/10 would take again
Dr. Warner was an excellent professor who gave me valuable feedback on each assignment. Thanks to his guidance, I learned much about teaching my future students in this education course.

This is a wonderful class! He gives very detailed and kind feedback for all of the assignments, the assignments can be long however you have plenty of time to work on them. Highly reccomend taking him!

I highly, highly recommend taking Dr. Warner's class! His class is mostly comprised of weekly discussion posts and some projects here and there. His criteria is pretty clear and he provides a list of questions to address and answer in the assignments. I have not gotten less than 100% for any assignment, very easy grader!

Dr. Warner has been the absolute best professor in the process of getting my master's degree. As a part of our work, we had to spend three semesters working on an action research paper, and Dr. Warner was with us every step of the way. He honestly cares about all of his students, and he wants the best for us. Take him if you can!

This professor made me enjoy the class. He graded very quickly and was always on top of things. He had weekly discussion posts and large assignments, but they were not hard to do.He gave feedback on each and every assignment. I enjoyed this class so much and would recommend Dr. Warner to anyone who needs to take this class.

Professor Warner is extremely kind and takes much time to give great feedback to every assignment you turn in. He was extremely understanding and I wish I could have him as my professor for many more of my classes! :)

Dr. Warner is the best! I took him last semester for 2 courses, and I knew I wanted to take him again. He's an easy grader and gives great advice and help when needed. I am taking him again next semester. Best grad school professor!

Dr. Warner was amazing! I took him for ECE 7514 & ECE 7511 in the same semester. I registered to take him again in the Fall because he is amazing. He grades easily and always responds to your emails promptly. It's a lot of work for a summer semester but he's flexible. Highly recommend him!

Dr. Warner genuinely cares about his students' success. He always offered detailed and thorough feedback on all assignments and discussions. He was also very flexible with due dates for assignments, which was great for me since I was student teaching and was often exhausted and didn't want to work once I got home. Take him if you have the chance!

he is so kind and understands we have other classes, I don't think he really has due dates because I've turned in stuff late and got a 100%. he gives wonderful feedback and grade super quickly. there's like 6 discussions and like 5 or 6 projects with no final. this class was online and is an easy 100 as long as you complete everything.

Absolutely loved this professor. He gave wonderful feedback that has encouraged me to continue my career of being a teacher. His assignments are very clear and straightforward. Please take him if you can!!!

Professor Warner is hands down the best teacher at KSU. His feedback is heart warming and honest and motivates you to work, learn, and grow. He's very flexible and above all else wants to see you succeed. He is not as stern as many of the professors are which is a wonderful thing for many reasons. He is an amazing teacher and I will miss his class.
Dr. Warner is amazing. I took him 3 semesters in a row in my graduate courses. He is caring, flexible, and wants to see you succeed. His feedback on your research is honest and meaningful.

Professor Warner was my favorite professor at KSU. He is so caring and understands that life happens. He lets you turn in late work for full credit. He also gives positive feedback on every assignment. Take this professor if you can!!
Professor Warner was amazing! He gives very helpful and in-depth feedback. He is also very forgiving when it comes to late assignments.

Dr. Warner was great! He was available to help via email and would give samples and clarification as needed on assignments. He was a fair grader and wanted us to learn as much "real life" information as we could to bring back into our classrooms. I would take him again.

This professor is super nice and understanding. He will take anything late. This is a plus especially if you are really busy with other classes. He takes good care of his students and as long as you do the work it should be an easy A in the class. Overall, I liked him and I would definitely take his class again if I could. 10/10 would recommend!

Dr. Warner is the best professor I had while working towards both my undergraduate and graduate degrees. His expectations, while intense at times, are clear. Since my class was online, he held phone conferences throughout the semester to assist however he could. He is kind and truly wants everyone to do well. I am fortunate to have taken his course
He is a pretty straightforward grader and he also gives good feedback on assignments.

Professor Warner was a very thoughtful teacher that gave incredible feedback! Assignments were super easy and he provides a link to the textbook online so you do not have to purchase the book! Assignments given throughout the semester were easy to complete and were graded within the same day typically! I definitely recommend taking online!
He's pretty much the best professor I've ever had, actually. He really cares about his students and gives great feedback on assignments. I can't recommend him enough!

Professor Warner is the BEST teacher at KSU. He has deadlines for all the assignments but he never penalizes you for turning it in late. No quizzes or tests. Only discussion posts and projects. I got a 100 on every assignment. He really cares about his students and knows we have other classes to worry about as well. I HIGHLY recommend him.

Dr. Warner is explicit in his expectations but is also always willing to answer questions and clarify his words. He expresses care for your work and wants you to do well. For an education course, he is exactly what you need to stay focused and still learn while completing his class. I would take him 100 times if I could.

This professor is amazing! I had him online and he knows you have other classes to worry about so he makes this class a breeze! Weekly discussion posts and a project due every month or so but super easy stuff! You dont even need to put a lot of effort into the stuff to get 100s! Hes also very caring and accessible via email.

Wow he's amazing. I had something personal come up and he was completely understanding and flexible and still allowed me to complete an assignment that I missed. He genuinely just wants all of his students to succeed.

I dont even know where to start from! Ive never done one of this before but I had to come do it because of how much I LOVE HIM! TAKE HIM! Best professor hands down!!! Very understanding and caring! He has such a big heart and he just wants u to try, as long as u put some effort you are guaranteed an A!!! Everyone need to meet a professor like him

There were only a few assignments and as long as you turn them in you will get a 100%. You only have to put minimal effort forth to turn in the assignment and you will be fine. Would take again for the easiest A!

Loved this professor, was very laid back and let you work at your own pace which I loved because it made me not as stressed and I felt more comfortable doing my work correctly instead of being rushed and overwhelmed.

Dr. Warner is AWESOME. He is such a caring professor and truly works with you! One of the easiest A's I've every had! As long as you go to class you hardly have any required assignments. If you don't go to class you can do an alternative assignment from at home to get credit. If you do one of the two you are guaranteed an A! SUCH an easy course

Great class! He was always very encouraging and always willing to help. He responds quickly to questions. Online assignments have very clear expectations and everything is very organized and easy to follow.
Awesome professor who knows the field and is very passionate! He makes lectures fun and you learn a lot! SIGN UP FOR HIM NOW!!!
Such a good professor and so understanding! TAKE HIM!

I wish I could pick more of those tags! He is my FAVORITE professor I have had yet! He is really there for his students. He listens, he gives good feedback. He wants you to succeed.  Dr. Warner is fair and honest, always willing to give you more help with the assignment or just listen. I didn't think I learned a lot, but really, I did. He rocks.
Professor Warner is an amazing professor that works with the students to achieve success in his class.  I highly recommend him to anyone in the education field!
Excellent professor to take!  I would seriously consider taking him for each EDUC class I could.

Dr. Warner is by far my favorite EDUC major teacher! He is so flexible with work and pushes me to be a better teacher! He has a great personality and is willing to help you out whenever you need it! I really advise you to take his class! I am also taking him for TOSS!
Super carefree teacher. Definitely supportive towards your learning. Talks a lot, but just wants to help you do your best.

Attendance is not mandatory, but he can give you a bad recommendation for acceptance into the program if you do not attend on a regular basis. He allows you to redo any assignment that you do not do well on. He is VERY helpful and very understanding. Just do the assignments, easy A.

Dr. Warner is one of THE best profs @ KSU. He has a ton of experience in Education, is VERY interested in his students, and is always willing to help. Sometimes his instructions may not be clear at first but when we brought it to his attn he cleared it up or even changed the assignment. DEF take him
